channel.title: How do i change
channel.description: Okay to start off im using a divine pk source and when I log on it says welcome to divinepk ive tried many ways to change it but it didnt work ive been looking for the past 2 hrs can someone help me out here? which file do i got to ? thanks

item.title: How do i change
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

Ohhh, That is your Adverts.xml

Go into the Adverts.xml.gz folder, Edit the Adverts.xml, Then Compress it using a compression tool, Delete the old Adverts.xml.gz and replace it with your new Adverts.xml.gz, and extract it. Then if you go back 1, Replace the other old Adverts.xml.gz with your new 1, and you should be done.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

Go to Src\com\rscd\packethandler\playerlogin.java

Ctrl+f

Search ‘‘Divine’’

And then edit the text inbetween the ‘‘Welcome to Divine Pk’’ to whatever you like.

Read full topic
